attributes.action: we need the 40P a mile rate to increase inline with fuel costs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For years the 40p a mile rate for employees has remained the same. With risisng fuel costs and falling residuals on second hand cars the cost of motoring is over 40P per mile for many users. The government needs to address this and allow a flat rate of 60P a mile for all business users.
